downloadDescription: This paper provides administrators with guidance for combining Microsoft Application Virtualization 5.0 (App-V 5.0) and Citrix solutions.
detailsSection: This paper is designed to provide administrators with guidance for combining Microsoft Application Virtualization 5.0 (App-V 5.0) and Citrix solutions. It discusses the benefits of App-V 5.0 and Citrix, recommendations for Citrix images, App-V cache management, App-V management with Citrix, factors that impact user experience and administrative effort, and the Citrix XenApp Connector for System Center Configuration Manger 2012 SP1.
systemRequirementsSection: This guide is available in .docx format. To access the file. you will need Microsoft Word or a compatible program.
installInstructionSection: Click the Download button and open the file directly or save it to your local machine for future reference.
